Hero.statusBadge: Accepting New Projects: Build your MVP in 30 Days
Hero.description: Building a tech team is slow, expensive, and risky. Crediblemark combines <white>AI Automation</white> with <white>Senior Engineers</white> to build your app faster, cheaper, and better. We are your dedicated product team.
Hero.poweredBy: PREMIUM DEVELOPMENT • SENIOR EXPERTS • AI WORKFLOWS

Ecosystem.title: Why Choose Us?
Ecosystem.subtitle: We don't just email you updates. You get full access to track progress in real-time.
Ecosystem.clientDesc: No more black boxes. Monitor daily logs, approve features, and track every dollar spent in real-time.
Ecosystem.squadDesc: Success requires experience. We strictly deploy vetted Senior Engineers. No juniors, no interns learning on your dime.
Ecosystem.adminDesc: Sleep well knowing your IP is safe. We implement banking-grade security and performance testing on every release.

saas.desc: Validate your startup idea in 30 days. We build the frontend and backend, you launch.

Workflow.title: No Drama. No Meeting. Direct Action.
Workflow.subtitle: Efficiency of asynchronous workflow for maximum results.
Workflow.step1Desc: Chat with our AI to scope your project. It generates a comprehensive Brief and Technical Spec instantly.
Workflow.step2Desc: Watch your project build in real-time via the Workbench. Senior Engineers execute the spec with AI assistance.
Workflow.step3Desc: Review progress in your Dashboard. Drop comments on specific features. Approve completed milestones directly from your secure portal.

Financial.title: Save Cost, Not Quality.
Financial.subtitle: Smart investment logic for modern business.

Guarantee.title: We Take the Risk for You.
Guarantee.subtitle: 100% Money Back Guarantee on Briefing Phase
Guarantee.desc: We are very confident in our hybrid system. If after the AI briefing session and receiving your initial Blueprint you feel our approach isn't a fit, we return your deposit 100%.
Guarantee.footer: No questions asked. No drama. You still get to keep the AI-generated Blueprint analysis.

Included.title: Included with Every Service
Included.subtitle: No matter which package you choose, Crediblemark quality standards are included.
Included.f1Desc: All source code and design assets are fully yours, forever.
Included.f2Desc: In-depth briefing with our team to ensure your project vision is accurate.
Included.f3Desc: One dedicated senior developer focused on executing your business needs.
Included.f4Desc: 30-day bug fix warranty and technical assistance after deployment.
Included.f5Desc: Measured timeline (typically 2-4 weeks) for production-ready results.
Included.f6Desc: Full documentation and industry-standard code structure for easy scaling.

Expert.title: Human Brain. Machine Intelligence.
Expert.name: Rasyiqi
Expert.q: Is the code built by robots?
Expert.a: AI is the hammer. I am the Architect.
Expert.desc: I use AI to handle the boring stuff so I can focus on what matters: your app's logic, security, and performance.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.q1: Can I really not chat directly?
FAQ.a1: Our platform is designed for efficiency through Asynchronous communication. Everything is neatly recorded. But for emergency situations or deep strategy consultations, Premium Call sessions are available.
FAQ.q2: What if there are bugs after completion?
FAQ.a2: All packages include a 30-Day Bug Warranty. Report via dashboard, fixes are prioritized.
FAQ.q3: Do I own the source code?
FAQ.a3: Yes, 100%. After final payment, the GitHub repository will be transferred to your account.
FAQ.a4: We build in public. You can provide feedback on every milestone via the Mission Control dashboard. Major shifts in scope are handled as new mission add-ons.
FAQ.q5: What tech stack do you use?
FAQ.a5: We primarily utilize Next.js & TypeScript, but flexibility is key. We have Human Experts specializing in various stacks, allowing us to adapt perfectly to your specific requirements.
FAQ.q6: Can you integrate with my existing systems?
FAQ.a6: Absolutely. We routinely integrate with Stripe, Midtrans, Slack, Discord, Google Cloud, and various third-party APIs to build a unified ecosystem.

Overview.aiHelperDesc: Our AI Systems Engineer is online and ready to help you scope your next mission.
